hooks.command: if command -v osascript > /dev/null 2>&1; then osascript -e 'display notification "Claude Code session completed" with title "Claude Code"'; elif command -v powershell > /dev/null 2>&1; then powershell -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Windows.Forms; [System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox]::Show('Claude Code session completed', 'Claude Code')"; else echo 'Claude Code session completed' >> ~/.claude/session-log.txt; fi
